tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Dental Fillings,Teeth Whitening,
review: I have had a history of dental issues but was always a failure. 12 years back I visited Dr. Santosha S. Kharvi for a RCT with cap and he did a wonderful job and with that, I have recommended him to many others and re visited his clinic for my other fillings and another RCT with cap. He is the most trust-worthy doctor that I can bet on. He is very gentle in his operation and explains what is going on and what will be done. Not at all over charged in regards to the rate and fee. I wish him long success for what he is!
reply_text:
Thank you so much Mr Glamis
I hope you are doing good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Santosh Kharvei is  experienced and humble .He has detailed knowledge about  dental treatment .I would recommend  people with dental problem   to approach Dr Santosh n get treated from him  .Thank you Dr for treating  me even during this pandemic situation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I did 3 treatments which was supposed to be done in months time but did in a week time. The Doctor has an art and his hands are very safe.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Being my first time .. dr. Santhosha was patient and understanding  he knew what needed to be done and did not give unnecessary suggestions
